messages.title: A Strong Voice for Britain
messages.content: Check my website to see when I will be in your area, and times of public meetings. Hope to see you during the campaign. The risk of another hung parliament is that it will be dominated by those who want to spend your money on things you and your family cannot afford. We all want better schools, NHS, etc. But only the Conservatives make sure that the economy is working first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A vote for Bernard is a vote for continuing economic recovery.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Better public services at lower cost
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A vote for Bernard is a vote for better public services at lower cost.
A vote for Bernard is a vote for more personal and family responsibility.
A vote for Bernard is a vote for a secure Britain; strong, independent and free.
A vote for Bernard is a vote for a strong voice for you in Parliament.

issues.economy: But only the Conservatives make sure that the economy is working first.
issues.governance: The risk of another hung parliament is that it will be dominated by those who want to spend your money on things you and your family cannot afford.
